newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee steady vs dollar, pound.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee steady vs dollar, pound.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee was steady against both the dollar and the pound sterling on Thursday, reflecting international market trends, foreign exchange dealers said.
The rupee was fixed at a commercial mean rate of 21.04 to the dollar from 21.033 on Wednesday, and at 35.4935 to the pound from 35.4835.
Forex dealers said few commercial banks were in hard currency shortage positions and were expecting central bank's intervention.
